channel.title: MoparCraft
channel.description: I've seen a lot of potential in this community involving private servers, if it gets big enough.. how about Mitb start considering a "MoparCraft" website for it's own? That will allow it to expand in so many ways and hey, maybe if it gets that big i might buy the game :D.

item.title: MoparCraft
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

i also read that zee_best from google is making an open-source client for minecraft. http://www.google.org/2442768-post7.html its just a post i havent found where zee_best said so but when comments later in that thread.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparCraft
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:23, topic:377437”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=473334.msg3461953#msg3461953 date=1294544658]
Looks to me like tomscape bought the domain.

Either way, ‘MoparCraft’ sort of infringes on two trademarks at the same time, so I wouldn’t have used that name anyway.
[/quote]

Awh, I wanted to have a bit of fun and you went and ruined it! Anyway, who wants the domain because I don’t.

It was actually incredibly cheap from tech-hosts and they allow one-bip meaning I could buy every domain going ;)[/quote]
i guess ill take it :d

Read full topic

item.title: MoparCraft
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:27, topic:377437”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=473334.msg3461982#msg3461982 date=1294546094]

craft probably cant be in the name. could MC still be the initials? or would that still be infringement? moparforge? i was trying to think of synonyms for a name.

Forge? Wut.
[/quote]

Main Entry: forge
Part of Speech: verb
Definition: make something from scratch

craft probably cant be in the name. could MC still be the initials? or would that still be infringement? moparforge? i was trying to think of synonyms for a name.

Nobody has or even can copyright the word ‘craft’, Anyway the community will be small so we wont be noticed compared to bigger servers

craft isnt copyrighted, but having a game remake of minecraft with craft in the name would be to close. for example: if you bought the domain name hershey.us and sold chocolate on that site. hershey could potentially sue you.[/quote]

That’s the exact and full name though.
If the site was chocshey.us, they could have no business suing you.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparCraft
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:8, topic:377539”][quote author=xryz link=topic=473334.msg3461979#msg3461979 date=1294545992]
craft probably cant be in the name. could MC still be the initials? or would that still be infringement? moparforge? i was trying to think of synonyms for a name.
[/quote]

Nobody has or even can copyright the word ‘craft’, Anyway the community will be small so we wont be noticed compared to bigger servers[/quote]

When the name “craft” is used when naming a community and is centered around Mine"craft", that is when the legitimacy of “craft” in copyrights comes into question.

[quote=“xryz, post:27, topic:377437”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=473334.msg3461982#msg3461982 date=1294546094]

craft probably cant be in the name. could MC still be the initials? or would that still be infringement? moparforge? i was trying to think of synonyms for a name.

Forge? Wut.
[/quote]

Main Entry: forge
Part of Speech: verb
Definition: make something from scratch[/quote]

I know what forge means. But if you “forge” something, generally, metal is thought of.

Read full topic

craft probably cant be in the name. could MC still be the initials? or would that still be infringement? moparforge? i was trying to think of synonyms for a name.

craft probably cant be in the name. could MC still be the initials? or would that still be infringement? moparforge? i was trying to think of synonyms for a name.
[/quote]

Nobody has or even can copyright the word ‘craft’, Anyway the community will be small so we wont be noticed compared to bigger servers[/quote]

craft isnt copyrighted, but having a game remake of minecraft with craft in the name would be to close. for example: if you bought the domain name hershey.us and sold chocolate on that site. hershey could potentially sue you.
